title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The Info page in the Project Properties dialog should display certain fields as readonly Labels, but they are currently displayed as readonly Text fields. This is causing the layout to look bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog displays certain fields as readonly Text fields instead of Labels.
EB: The Info page in the Project Properties dialog should display certain fields as readonly Labels.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and choose Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the readonly fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as Text fields instead of Labels.
